ygData.subject: RE: [archive-crawler] how to get external links only 1 hop and still get the whole domain within 20 hops
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Kris Thanks for your answer - we will try your suggestion.  Yes, just 1 L link hop or perhaps also 2, if it is a link to e.g. a public imagecatalog like
